DOC.brief_summary: The study examines prospects of hypnotherapy in reducing agitation in patients after cardiac or spinal column surgery. A particular aim is to point out the effects on postoperative cognitive outcome. Additional blood and urine tests are conducted (concerning cardiac stratum).
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Perioperative Hypnotherapy on Postoperative Improvement in Cognitive Performance
